original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

analyzed: hetu

original: Sappaccayaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: sappaccayam kusalam dhammam paṭicca sappaccayaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā eka ārammaṇe eka adhipatiyā ekaṃ pe avigate eka saṅkhitta

original: Naadhipati
analyzed: na adhipati

original: Sappaccayaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo kusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: sa paccayam kusalam dhammam paṭicca sa paccayaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati na adhipati paccayā

original: Naadhipatiyā ekaṁ, napurejāte ekaṁ, napacchājāte ekaṁ, naāsevane ekaṁ, nakamme ekaṁ, navipāke ekaṁ, navippayutte ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na adhipatiyā eka na purejāte eka na pacchājāte eka na āsevane eka na kamme eka na vipāke eka na vippayutte eka saṅkhitta

original: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṁsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāraḥ api paccaya vāraḥ api nissaya vāraḥ api sa saṭṭha vāraḥ api sampayutta vāraḥ api paṭicca vāra sadisā vitthāretabbā

original: Hetu
analyzed: hetu

original: Sappaccayo kusalo dhammo sappaccayassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: sappaccayaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ sappaccayassa kusalassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā eka ārammaṇe ekaṃ pe avigate eka saṅkhitta

original: Sappaccayaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: sa paccayam akusalam dhammam paṭicca sa paccayaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā eka ārammaṇe ekaṃ pe avigate eka sahajāta vāre pi pe pañhā vāre pi sabbattha eka

analyzed: a byākata pada

analyzed: paccaya catukka

original: Hetu
analyzed: hetu

original: Sappaccayaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: sa paccayam abyākatam dhammam paṭicca sa paccayaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā eka ārammaṇe ekaṃ pe avigate eka saṅkhitta

original: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naārammaṇe ekaṁ, naadhipatiyā ekaṁ. (Sabbattha ekaṁ, saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetuyāḥ eka na ārammaṇe eka na adhipatiyāḥ eka sabbattha eka saṅkhitta

original: Hetvādi
analyzed: hetu ādi

original: Sappaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: sappaccayaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Sappaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: sappaccayaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Appaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: appaccayaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Sappaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: sappaccayaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Appaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: appaccayaḥ abyākataḥ dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇa upanissayo

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve, anantare ekaṁ …pe… nissaye ekaṁ, upanissaye dve, purejāte ekaṁ, pacchājāte ekaṁ, (sabbattha ekaṁ), avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā eka ārammaṇe dve adhipatiyā dve anantare ekaṃ pe nissaye eka upanissaye dve purejāte eka pacchājāte eka sabbattha eka avigate eka saṅkhitta

original: Paccanīyuddhāra
analyzed: paccanīya uddhāra

original: Sappaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: sappaccayaḥ abyākataḥ dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ sahajāta paccayena paccayaḥ upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Appaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: appaccayaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta

original: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetuyā dve na ārammaṇe eka saṅkhitta

original: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetu paccayāḥ na ārammaṇe eka saṅkhitta

original: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

analyzed: sa paccaya duka kusala ttikam niṭṭhita

analyzed: saṅkhataduka kusalattika

Paccayacatukka

original: Hetu
analyzed: hetu

original: Anidassanaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassano abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: anidassanam abyākatam dhammam paṭicca anidassanaḥ abyākataḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe eka adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi saṅkhitta

original: Nahetuyā tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi), nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, naāhāre tīṇi …pe… novigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetuyā tīṇi sabbattha tīṇi na kamme tīṇi na vipāke tīṇi na āhāre tīṇi pe no vigate tīṇi saṅkhitta

original: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṁsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāraḥ api paccaya vāraḥ api nissaya vāraḥ api sa saṭṭha vāraḥ api sampayutta vāraḥ api paṭicca vāra sadisā vitthāretabbā

original: Hetvādi
analyzed: hetu ādi

original: Anidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassanaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Sanidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: sa nidassanaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Anidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: anidassanaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Sanidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati.
analyzed: sa nidassanaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa adhipati paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇa adhipati

original: Anidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena
analyzed: anidassanaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa adhipati paccayena

original: paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Anidassano abyākato dhammo sanidassanassa
analyzed: paccayaḥ ārammaṇa adhipati sahajāta adhipati anidassanaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ sa nidassanassa

original: abyākatassa ca anidassanassa abyākatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—sahajātādhipati.
analyzed: abyākatassa ca a nidassanassa abyākatassa ca dhammassa adhipati paccayena paccayo sahajāta adhipati

original: Sanidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—pakatūpanissayo.
analyzed: sa nidassanaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa upanissaya paccayena paccaya upakata upanissayaḥ

original: Anidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe…. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: anidassanaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa upanissaya paccayena paccayo ārammaṇa upanissayo anantara upanissayo pakata upanissayo pe saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare ekaṁ …pe… sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe dve adhipatiyā tīṇi anantare ekam pe sahajāte tīṇi aññamaññe

original: ekaṁ, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye dve, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṁ,
analyzed: eka nissaye tīṇi upanissaye dve purejāte tīṇi pacchājāte tīṇi āsevane eka

original: kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi) sampayutte ekaṁ, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā
analyzed: kamme tīṇi vipāke tīṇi sabbattha tīṇi sampayutte eka vippayutte tīṇi atthiyā

original: pañca, natthiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: pañca natthiyā ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Sanidassanadukakusalattikaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
analyzed: sani dassana duka kusala ttikam niṭṭhita

original: Appaccayampi asaṅkhatampi sanidassanampi na labbhati.
analyzed: appaccayam pi asaṅkhatam pi sa nidassanam pi na labbhati

analyzed: sa paṭigha duka kusala ttika

analyzed: kusalapada

analyzed: appaṭigham kusalam dhammam paṭicca appaṭighaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… vippayutte ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā eka ārammaṇe ekaṃ pe vippayutte ekaṃ pe avigate eka saṅkhitta

original: (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāre pi pe pañhā vāre pi sabbattha eka

analyzed: appaṭigham akusalam dhammam paṭicca appaṭighaḥ akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ (pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā ekam pe avigate ekam pañhā vāre pi sabbattha eka

analyzed: hetu

original: Sappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: sa paṭigham abyākatam dhammam paṭicca sa paṭighaḥ abyākataḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Sappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: sappaṭigham abyākatam dhammam paṭicca appaṭighaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Sappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho abyākato ca appaṭigho abyākato ca
analyzed: sa paṭigham abyākatam dhammam paṭicca sa paṭighaḥ abyākato ca appaṭighaḥ abyākato ca

original: dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … nava.
analyzed: dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā nava

original: Appaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: appaṭigham abyākatam dhammam paṭicca appaṭighaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati ārammaṇa paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe ekaṁ, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye ekaṁ, purejāte āsevane ekaṁ, kamme nava, vipāke nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe eka adhipatiyā nava pe aññamaññe cha nissaye nava upanissaye eka purejāte āsevane eka kamme nava vipāke nava pe avigate nava saṅkhitta

original: Nahetu
analyzed: na hetu

original: Sappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: sa paṭigham abyākatam dhammam paṭicca sa paṭighaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati na hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuyā nava …pe… novigate nava. (Sabbattha nava, saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetuyā nava pe no vigate nava sabbattha nava saṅkhitta

original: 3.3.4.1.7. Pañhāvāra
analyzed: pañhāvāra

original: Paccayacatukka
analyzed: paccaya catukka

original: Hetu
analyzed: hetu

original: Appaṭigho abyākato dhammo appaṭighassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: appaṭighaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ appaṭighassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare ekaṁ, samanantare ekaṁ, sahajāte
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe dve adhipatiyā tīṇi anantare eka samanantare eka sahajāte

original: nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye dve, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi,
analyzed: nava aññamaññe cha nissaye nava upanissaye dve purejāte tīṇi pacchājāte tīṇi

original: āsevane ekaṁ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye pañca, jhāne tīṇi, magge
analyzed: āsevane eka kamme tīṇi vipāke tīṇi āhāre tīṇi indriye pañca jhāne tīṇi magge

original: tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṁ, vippayutte cattāri, atthiyā nava, natthiyā ekaṁ, vigate ekaṁ, avigate nava.
analyzed: tīṇi sampayutte eka vippayutte cattāri atthiyā nava natthiyā eka vigate eka avigate nava

original: Paccanīyuddhāra
analyzed: paccanīya uddhāra

original: Sappaṭigho abyākato dhammo sappaṭighassa abyākatassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: sappaṭighaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ sappaṭighassa abyākatassa dhammassa sahajāta paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta

original: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetuyā nava na ārammaṇe nava saṅkhitta

original: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetu paccayāḥ na ārammaṇe tīṇi

original: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetu paccayā ārammaṇe dve

original: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
analyzed: yathā kusala ttike pañhāvārassa anulomam pi paccanīyam pi anuloma paccanīyam pi paccanīya anulomam pi gaṇitaḥ evam gaṇetabba

original: Sappaṭighadukakusalattikaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
analyzed: sa paṭigha duka kusala ttikam niṭṭhita

original: 3.3.5. Rūpīduka, Kusalattika
analyzed: rūpīduka kusalattika

original: Hetu
analyzed: hetu

original: Arūpiṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca arūpī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: arūpim kusalam dhammam paṭicca arūpī kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ.
analyzed: hetuyā eka ārammaṇe eka

original: Arūpiṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca arūpī akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
